DESCRIPTIONS.LITTLE_BIO: I love creating new things and be part of the change contributing to it. Passionate to programming and development.

ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_1: I've been working professionally in programming since 2021, but my passion began when I was 14 years old, creating Discord bots and websites for my friends and myself.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_2: My motivation is to create products that creates value and keep up with the advancement of new technologies. I enjoy contributing to projects that improve people's lives.

I also like to attend cultural and tech events in my city. Professionally, I spend a significant part of my day integrating and improving features at work and developing my personal projects.
